incident_updates.body: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Network Services offer. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 21/01/2026 08:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : BYOIP delivery and release. Customers Impact : As a result, we have to stop provisioning new BYOIP prefixes. Customers will not be able to request new BYOIP ranges or release existing ones until a solution is identified. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our vRack Private Network offer on rack GRA0328B06A in GRA3. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 21/01/2026 10:58 UTC Impacted Service(s) : vRack private network on the servers in the specified rack is unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers through vRack private network. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our technical teams are working to restore the service. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 22/01/2026 01:30 UTC End time : 22/01/2026 10:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.
